thread.title: Liverpool Legend Steven Gerrard has 2nd best selling MLS shirt
thread.title_full: Liverpool Legend Steven Gerrard has 2nd best selling MLS shirt

author: paulmbanks
title: Liverpool Legend Steven Gerrard has 2nd best selling MLS shirt
text:
6 Obafemi Martins – Seattle Sounders 7 Frank Lampard – NYCFC 8 Bradley Wright-Phillips – NY Red Bulls 9 Brek Shea – Orlando City 10 Mix Diskerud – NYCFC 
Chelsea legend Frank Lampard (who had a brief spell at Manchester City) also made the list, checking in at #7. No surprise here but international figures Kaka, David Villa and Andrea Pirlo also cracked the top ten. 
Paul M. Banks owns, operates and sometimes writes The Sports Bank.net , which is partnered with FOX Sports Engage Network. The website is also featured on News Now. Banks, a former writer for the Washington Times, currently contributes to the Chicago Tribune RedEye. He also appears regularly on numerous television and radio talk shows all across the country. Catch him Tuesdays on KOZN 1620 The Zone.
